LanguageData.Nudist.degreeDatas.0.label: nudist
LanguageData.Nudist.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. {PAWN_pronoun} can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
LanguageData.Bloodlust.degreeDatas.0.label: bloodlust
LanguageData.Bloodlust.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. {PAWN_pronoun} is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
LanguageData.Kind.degreeDatas.0.label: kind
LanguageData.Kind.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. {PAWN_pronoun} never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also never judges people by their appearance.
LanguageData.Psychopath.degreeDatas.0.label: psychopath
LanguageData.Psychopath.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother {PAWN_objective} at all. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects {PAWN_objective}. {PAWN_pronoun} also feels no mood boost from socializing.
LanguageData.Cannibal.degreeDatas.0.label: cannibal
LanguageData.Cannibal.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, {PAWN_pronoun} tried it... and {PAWN_pronoun} liked it.
LanguageData.Abrasive.degreeDatas.0.label: abrasive
LanguageData.Abrasive.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} always says exactly what's on {PAWN_possessive} mind, especially if it's bugging {PAWN_objective}. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
LanguageData.TooSmart.degreeDatas.0.label: too smart
LanguageData.TooSmart.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is too smart for {PAWN_possessive} own good. {PAWN_pronoun} learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
LanguageData.Brawler.degreeDatas.0.label: brawler
LanguageData.Brawler.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes to fight up close and personal. {PAWN_possessive} accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but {PAWN_pronoun}'ll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.Masochist.degreeDatas.0.label: masochist
LanguageData.Masochist.degreeDatas.0.description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, there's something exciting about getting hurt. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't know why, {PAWN_pronoun}'s just wired differently.
LanguageData.NightOwl.degreeDatas.0.label: night owl
LanguageData.NightOwl.degreeDatas.0.description:
{PAWN_nameDef} likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

{PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

{PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
LanguageData.Greedy.degreeDatas.0.label: greedy
LanguageData.Greedy.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} needs a really impressive bedroom. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't get what {PAWN_pronoun} wants.
LanguageData.Jealous.degreeDatas.0.label: jealous
LanguageData.Jealous.degreeDatas.0.description: For {PAWN_nameDef}, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. {PAWN_pronoun} gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
LanguageData.Ascetic.degreeDatas.0.label: ascetic
LanguageData.Ascetic.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. {PAWN_pronoun} will become unhappy if {PAWN_pronoun} has a bedroom that's too impressive. {PAWN_pronoun} also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. {PAWN_pronoun} never judges others by their appearance.
LanguageData.Gay.degreeDatas.0.label: gay
LanguageData.Gay.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.
LanguageData.Bisexual.degreeDatas.0.label: bisexual
LanguageData.Bisexual.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to both men and women.
LanguageData.Asexual.degreeDatas.0.label: asexual
LanguageData.Asexual.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
LanguageData.AnnoyingVoice.degreeDatas.0.label: annoying voice
LanguageData.AnnoyingVoice.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and {PAWN_pronoun} tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike {PAWN_objective}.
LanguageData.CreepyBreathing.degreeDatas.0.label: creepy breathing
LanguageData.CreepyBreathing.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef} breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
LanguageData.Pyromaniac.degreeDatas.0.label: pyromaniac
LanguageData.Pyromaniac.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} loves fire. {PAWN_pronoun} will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, {PAWN_pronoun} will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if {PAWN_possessive} mood is low.
LanguageData.Wimp.degreeDatas.0.label: wimp
LanguageData.Wimp.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize {PAWN_objective}.
LanguageData.Nimble.degreeDatas.0.label: nimble
LanguageData.Nimble.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. {PAWN_pronoun} seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
LanguageData.FastLearner.degreeDatas.0.label: fast learner
LanguageData.FastLearner.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a knack for learning. {PAWN_pronoun} picks things up much faster than others.
LanguageData.SlowLearner.degreeDatas.0.label: slow learner
LanguageData.SlowLearner.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is slow on the uptake. {PAWN_pronoun} learns much slower than others.
LanguageData.Undergrounder.degreeDatas.0.label: undergrounder
LanguageData.Undergrounder.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has no need to experience the outdoors or light. {PAWN_pronoun} will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long {PAWN_pronoun} stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
LanguageData.Transhumanist.degreeDatas.0.label: body modder
LanguageData.Transhumanist.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels limited in {PAWN_possessive} feeble human body. {PAWN_pronoun} often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
LanguageData.BodyPurist.degreeDatas.0.label: body purist
LanguageData.BodyPurist.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes the human body is limited for a reason. To {PAWN_objective}, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
LanguageData.DislikesMen.degreeDatas.0.label: misandrist
LanguageData.DislikesWomen.degreeDatas.0.label: misogynist
LanguageData.GreatMemory.degreeDatas.0.label: great memory
LanguageData.GreatMemory.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a fantastic memory for detail. {PAWN_pronoun} will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
LanguageData.Tough.degreeDatas.0.label: tough
LanguageData.Tough.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. {PAWN_pronoun} takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely hard to kill.
LanguageData.TorturedArtist.degreeDatas.0.label: tortured artist
LanguageData.TorturedArtist.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. {PAWN_pronoun} will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
LanguageData.TorturedArtist.degreeDatas.0.mentalBreak: As a suffering tortured artist, [PAWN_nameIndef] has experienced an inspiration.
LanguageData.Gourmand.degreeDatas.0.label: gourmand
LanguageData.Gourmand.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s life revolves around food. {PAWN_pronoun} gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
LanguageData.QuickSleeper.degreeDatas.0.label: quick sleeper
LanguageData.QuickSleeper.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether {PAWN_pronoun}'s sleeping on a bed or on the ground, {PAWN_pronoun} will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.0.label: slowpoke
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is always falling behind the group whenever [PAWN_pronoun] goes anywhere.
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.1.label: fast walker
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to be where [PAWN_pronoun]'s going. [PAWN_pronoun] walks quicker than most people.
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.2.label: jogger
LanguageData.SpeedOffset.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.0.label: chemical fascination
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.1.label: chemical interest
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. [PAWN_pronoun] will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.2.label: teetotaler
LanguageData.DrugDesire.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. [PAWN_pronoun] strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.0.label: sanguine
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is just naturally upbeat about [PAWN_possessive] situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.1.label: optimist
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get [PAWN_objective] down.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.2.label: pessimist
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tends to look on the bad side of life.
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.3.label: depressive
LanguageData.NaturalMood.degreeDatas.3.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is perenially unhappy. [PAWN_pronoun] has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.0.label: iron-willed
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s will is an iron shield. [PAWN_pronoun] keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.1.label: steadfast
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.2.label: nervous
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.3.label: volatile
LanguageData.Nerves.degreeDatas.3.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is on a hair-trigger all the time. [PAWN_pronoun] is the first to break in any tough situation.
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreeDatas.0.label: neurotic
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to have things squared away. [PAWN_pronoun] will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can get the better of [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreeDatas.1.label: very neurotic
LanguageData.Neurotic.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. [PAWN_pronoun] will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but [PAWN_possessive] nerves can easily get the better of [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.0.label: industrious
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.1.label: hard worker
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.1.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.2.label: lazy
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.3.label: slothful
LanguageData.Industriousness.degreeDatas.3.descriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] loves idleness and hates anything productive. [PAWN_pronoun] moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.0.label: psychically hypersensitive
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.0.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is like a psychic tuning fork. [PAWN_pronoun] is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.1.label: psychically sensitive
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.1.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.2.label: psychically dull
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.2.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind is psychically out of tune with others. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.3.label: psychically deaf
LanguageData.PsychicSensitivity.degreeDatas.3.descrip: [PAWN_nameDef]'s mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. [PAWN_pronoun] just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.0.label: careful shooter
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.0.descripti: [PAWN_nameDef] takes more time to aim when shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.1.label: trigger-happy
LanguageData.ShootingAccuracy.degreeDatas.1.descripti: Pew! Pew! Pew! [PAWN_nameDef] just likes pulling the trigger. [PAWN_pronoun] shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.0.label: beautiful
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to [PAWN_objective] before [PAWN_pronoun] even opens [PAWN_possessive] mouth.
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.1.label: pretty
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like [PAWN_objective].
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.2.label: ugly
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.3.label: staggeringly ugly
LanguageData.Beauty.degreeDatas.3.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is staggeringly ugly. [PAWN_possessive] face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at [PAWN_objective] while conversing.
LanguageData.Immunity.degreeDatas.0.label: super-immune
LanguageData.Immunity.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a naturally powerful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
LanguageData.Immunity.degreeDatas.1.label: sickly
LanguageData.Immunity.degreeDatas.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has an awful immune system. [PAWN_pronoun] gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
